SQL.LOAD: SELECT coverage_type_id, business_entity_id, acct_business_unit_id, region_id, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, acct_cov_entity_id, ACCT_COV_TYPE_CODE FROM elp_acct_cov_entity WHERE acct_cov_entity_id = :acct_cov_entity_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select elp_acct_cov_entity.acct_cov_entity_id, elp_acct_cov_entity.coverage_type_id, ditCT.translation coverage_type, elp_acct_cov_entity.business_entity_id, ditBE.translation business_entity, elp_acct_cov_entity.acct_business_unit_id, elp_acct_cov_entity.ACCT_COV_TYPE_CODE, elp_acct_business_unit.business_unit, elp_acct_cov_entity.region_id, elp_acct_cov_entity.created_by, elp_acct_cov_entity.created_date, elp_acct_cov_entity.modified_by, elp_acct_cov_entity.modified_date, elp_acct_business_unit.business_unit from elp_acct_cov_entity, elp_acct_business_unit, elp_acct_company, elp_list_item liCT, elp_dict_item_translation ditCT, elp_list_item liBE, elp_dict_item_translation ditBE where ( ( getcodefromlistitem(elp_acct_company.cov_entity_by_region) = 'Y' ) OR ( getcodefromlistitem(elp_acct_company.cov_entity_by_region) = 'N' AND elp_acct_cov_entity.region_id IS NULL ) ) and elp_acct_company.acct_company_id = elp_acct_business_unit.acct_company_id and elp_acct_business_unit.acct_business_unit_id = elp_acct_cov_entity.acct_business_unit_id and liCT.list_item_id = elp_acct_cov_entity.coverage_type_id and ditCT.dict_item_id = liCT.dict_item_id and liBE.list_item_id = elp_acct_cov_entity.business_entity_id and ditBE.dict_item_id = liBE.dict_item_id and ditCT.language_id = ditBE.language_id --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_acct_cov_entity SET coverage_type_id = :coverage_type_id, business_entity_id = :business_entity_id, acct_business_unit_id = :acct_business_unit_id, region_id = :region_id, modified_by = :modified_by, ACCT_COV_TYPE_CODE = :ACCT_COV_TYPE_CODE WHERE acct_cov_entity_id = :acct_cov_entity_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_acct_cov_entity ( coverage_type_id, business_entity_id, acct_business_unit_id, region_id, created_by, ACCT_COV_TYPE_CODE, acct_cov_entity_id ) VALUES ( :coverage_type_id, :business_entity_id, :acct_business_unit_id, :region_id, :created_by, :ACCT_COV_TYPE_CODE, :acct_cov_entity_id )
